summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Live Sales Inventory & Anti-Theft Control System landing page. All core functionality working correctly including responsive design, navigation, CTA buttons, and external links.

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation link selector for 'how-it-works' not found during automated testing

passed_tests: Landing page loads successfully
Hero section renders with correct content and data-testid
Main heading 'Stop Losing Inventory In Live Sales' displays correctly
Navbar is sticky and positioned correctly
All CTA buttons link to correct external URL (https://live-sales-inventory-main.vercel.app)
Hero demo and trial buttons have correct external links
Navbar demo and trial buttons have correct external links
CTA section buttons have correct external links
Mobile responsiveness works correctly
Mobile menu opens and closes properly
Mobile CTA buttons have correct external links
Mixed theme implemented (dark hero section, light content sections)
Fonts (Barlow Condensed and Inter) load correctly
Framer-motion animations working (79+ animated elements detected)
All 11 required sections present: Hero, Problem, Pain Points, Consequences, Solution, How It Works, Benefits, Social Proof, Philosophy, Target Users, CTA
Footer section present with correct branding
25+ section headings found during scroll testing
Navigation links for Problem, Solution, and Benefits work correctly
External links open in new tabs with target='_blank'
Responsive design works on mobile viewport (390x844)
Desktop viewport (1920x1080) displays correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Verify navigation link data-testid for 'How It Works' section matches the expected format 'nav-link-how-it-works'
